name: Next.js + Tailwind + shadcn/ui
description: Professional web applications with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components. Optimized for enterprise-grade applications with high accessibility standards.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Clean, modern, and accessible design following shadcn/ui conventions. Emphasize clarity and usability over decoration.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Use the primary blue for interactive elements and calls-to-action. Secondary colors for supporting UI. Maintain high contrast ratios for accessibility.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Follow shadcn/ui component patterns. Use consistent spacing with Tailwind's spacing scale. Prefer composition over configuration.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: All components meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards. Ensure focus states are visible. Use semantic HTML elements.
